trans-unit.source: Tests should not affect each other. That’s a rule of thumb. When tests interact with a database, they may change the data inside it, which would eventually lead to data inconsistency. A test may try to insert a record that has already been inserted, or retrieve a deleted record. To avoid test failures, the database should be brought back to its initial state before each test. Codeception has different methods and approaches to get your data cleaned.
trans-unit.target: 测试不应相互影响。这是一个经验法则。当测试与数据库交互时，它们可能会更改数据库中的数据，最终将导致数据不一致。测试可能会尝试插入已插入的记录，或检索已删除的记录。为了避免测试失败，应该在每次测试之前将数据库恢复到其初始状态。Codeception有不同的方法和方法来清理您的数据。

trans-unit.source: The FunctionalTester class has its methods defined in modules. Actually, it doesn’t contain any of them, but rather acts as a proxy. It knows which module executes this action and passes parameters into it. To make your IDE see all of the FunctionalTester methods, you should run the codecept build command. It generates method signatures from enabled modules and saves them into a trait which is included in an actor. In the current example, the tests/support/_generated/FunctionalTesterActions.php file will be generated. By default, Codeception automatically rebuilds the Actions trait on each change of the suite configuration.
trans-unit.target: FunctionalTester类在模块中定义了其方法。实际上，它不包含任何一个，而是充当代理。它知道哪个模块执行此操作并将参数传递给该模块。要使您的IDE查看所有FunctionalTester方法，应运行 codecept build 命令。它从启用的模块中生成方法签名，并将其保存到actor中包含的特征中。在当前示例中，将生成 tests/support/_generated/FunctionalTesterActions.php 文件。默认情况下，Codeception会在套件配置的每次更改时自动重建Actions特性。

trans-unit.source: The same way we tested a web site, Codeception allows you to test web services. They are very hard to test manually, so it’s a really good idea to automate web service testing. trans-unit.source: There are lots of ways to create reusable and readable tests. Group common actions together and move them to an Actor class or StepObjects. Move CSS and XPath locators into PageObjects. Write your custom actions and assertions in Helpers. Scenario-driven tests should not contain anything more complex than $I->doSomething commands. Following this approach will allow you to keep your tests clean, readable, stable and make them easy to maintain.
trans-unit.target: 有很多方法可以创建可重用和可读的测试。将常见操作组合在一起，然后将其移至Actor类或StepObjects。将CSS和XPath定位器移到PageObjects中。在Helpers中编写您的自定义操作和断言。场景驱动的测试不应包含比 $I->doSomething 命令更复杂的内容。遵循这种方法将使您保持测试的清洁，可读性，稳定性，并使它们易于维护。

trans-unit.source: There is the WebDriver module for acceptance testing, modules for all popular PHP frameworks, PHPBrowser to emulate browser execution, REST for testing APIs, and more. trans-unit.target: 有用于接受测试的 WebDriver 模块，用于所有流行的PHP框架的模块，用于模拟浏览器执行的 PHPBrowser ，用于测试API的 REST 等。模块被认为是Codeception最有价值的部分。他们不断改进以提供最佳的测试体验，并灵活地满足每个人的需求。

trans-unit.source: There may be some confusion between test.start/test.before and test.after/test.end. The start and end events are triggered by PHPUnit, but the before and after events are triggered by Codeception. Thus, when you are using classical PHPUnit tests (extended from PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase), the before/after events won’t be triggered for them. During the test.before event you can mark a test as skipped or incomplete, which is not possible in test.start. You can learn more from Codeception internal event listeners.
trans-unit.target: 在 test.start / test.before 和 test.after / test.end 之间可能会有混淆。开始和结束事件由PHPUnit触发，但before和after事件由Codeception触发。因此，当您使用经典的PHPUnit测试（从 PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase 扩展）时，before / after事件将不会为它们触发。在 test.before 事件期间，您可以将测试标记为已跳过或未完成，这在 test.start 中是不可能的。您可以从Codeception内部事件侦听器中了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: To avoid confusion, Framework modules, PhpBrowser, and WebDriver can’t be used together. For instance, the amOnPage method exists in all those modules, and you should not try to guess which module will actually execute it. If you are doing acceptance testing, set up either WebDriver or PHPBrowser but do not set both up at the same time. If you are doing functional testing, enable only one of the framework modules.

trans-unit.source: Usually, as soon as any assertion fails, further assertions of this test will be skipped. Sometimes you don’t want this - maybe you have a long-running test and you want it to run to the end. In this case, you can use conditional assertions. Each see method has a corresponding canSee method, and dontSee has a cantSee method:
trans-unit.target: 通常，一旦任何断言失败，该测试的其他断言就会被跳过。有时您不希望这样做-也许您有一个长期运行的测试，并且希望它运行到最后。在这种情况下，您可以使用条件断言。每个 see 方法都有一个对应的 canSee 方法，而 dontSee 有一个 cantSee 方法：

trans-unit.source: Validates and prints Codeception config. Use it do debug Yaml configs
trans-unit.target: 验证并打印Codeception配置。用它来调试Yaml配置

trans-unit.source: Validates current config for required fields and required packages.
trans-unit.target: 验证当前所需字段和所需包的配置。

trans-unit.source: Variable names are being taken from config and DSN which has a keyword=value format, so you should expect to have a variable named as the keyword with the full value inside it.
trans-unit.target: 变量名称是从config和DSN中获取的，它们的格式为 keyword=value ，因此您应该期望其中包含一个具有关键字的变量，且其中包含完整的值。

trans-unit.source: Waits for element and runs a sequence of actions inside its context. Actions can be defined with array, callback, or Codeception\Util\ActionSequence instance.
trans-unit.target: 等待元素并在其上下文中运行一系列动作。可以使用数组，回调或 Codeception\Util\ActionSequence 实例定义操作。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for an element to appear on the page. If the element doesn’t appear, a timeout exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 最多等待$ timeout秒，元素才会显示在页面上。如果没有出现该元素，则抛出超时异常。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given element to be clickable. If element doesn’t become clickable, a timeout exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 最多等待$ timeout秒以使给定元素可单击。如果element不可单击，则抛出超时异常。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given element to be visible on the page. If element doesn’t appear, a timeout exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 等待最多$ timeout秒，使给定元素在页面上可见。如果没有出现element，则抛出超时异常。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given element to become invisible. If element stays visible, a timeout exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 等待指定的元素变成不可见的时间,最长为$timeout秒。如果元素一直可见,则会产生超时异常。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given element to change. Element “change” is determined by a callback function which is called repeatedly until the return value evaluates to true.
trans-unit.target: 等待最多$ timeout秒以更改给定的元素。元素“ change”由回调函数确定，该回调函数被重复调用，直到返回值评估为true。

trans-unit.source: Waits up to $timeout seconds for the given string to appear on the page.
trans-unit.target: 最多等待$timeout秒的时间,让指定的字符串出现在页面上。

trans-unit.source: We are using Codeception\Util\Xml class which allows us to build XML structures in a clean manner. The toXml method may accept a string or array and returns \DOMDocument instance. If your XML contains attributes and so can’t be represented as a PHP array you can create XML using the XmlBuilder class. We will take a look at it a bit more in next section.
trans-unit.target: 我们正在使用 Codeception\Util\Xml 类，该类允许我们以干净的方式构建XML结构。该 toXml 方法可以接受字符串或阵列，并返回\ DOM文档实例。如果XML包含属性，因此不能表示为PHP数组，则可以使用XmlBuilder类创建XML 。在下一部分中，我们将对其进行更多的研究。

trans-unit.source: We can click links to open web pages:
trans-unit.target: 我们可以点击链接打开网页。

trans-unit.source: We can submit forms as well:
We can test this scenario by executing it in dry-run mode. In this mode test won’t be executed (actually, we didn’t define any step for it, so it won’t be executed in any case).

trans-unit.source: We can try to write such simple story:

trans-unit.target: 我们可以使用 Codeception\Util\HttpCode HTTP代码常量（而不是数字值）来检查 seeResponseCodeIs 和 dontSeeResponseCodeIs 方法中的响应代码。

trans-unit.source: We have _before and _after methods to run some common actions before and after a test. And we have a placeholder action tryToTest which we need to implement. If we try to test a signin process it’s a good start to test a successful signin. Let’s rename this method to signInSuccessfully.
trans-unit.target: 我们有 _before 和 _after 方法在测试之前和之后运行一些常见的操作。我们需要执行一个占位符动作 tryToTest 。如果我们尝试测试登录过程，那么这是测试成功登录的良好起点。让我们将此方法重命名为 signInSuccessfully 。

trans-unit.target: 我们需要在接受套件配置中指定 url 参数：

trans-unit.source: We prepared a sample config with codeception, web server, database, and selenium with Chrome to be executed together.
trans-unit.target: 我们准备了一个示例配置,包括codeception、web服务器、数据库和selenium与Chrome一起执行。

trans-unit.source: We propose to perform those steps using a task runner. In this guide we will use Robo task runner. It is a modern PHP task runner that is very easy to use. It uses Symfony Process to spawn background and parallel processes. Just what we need for the step 2! What about steps 1 and 3? We have created robo tasks for splitting tests into groups and merging resulting JUnit XML reports.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用任务运行器执行这些步骤。在本指南中，我们将使用Robo任务运行程序。这是一个非常易于使用的现代PHP任务运行程序。它使用Symfony Process生成后台进程和并行进程。正是我们需要的第二步！那第1步和第3步呢？我们创建了自动任务，用于将测试分为几组并合并生成的JUnit XML报告。

trans-unit.source: We recommend using params to provide authorization credentials.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议使用参数来提供授权凭证。

trans-unit.source: We should see a step-by-step report on the performed actions:
trans-unit.target: 我们应该看到一个逐步执行的行动报告。

trans-unit.source: We should start by creating a test with the next command:
trans-unit.target: 我们应该先用下一条命令创建一个测试。

trans-unit.source: We will assume that all actions starting with am and have describe the initial environment. The amOnPage action sets the starting point of a test to the /login page.
trans-unit.target: 我们假定开始与所有行动 am ，并 have 描述的初始环境。该 amOnPage 动作设置一个测试的起点 /login 页面。

trans-unit.source: We will put all the api tests there.
trans-unit.target: 我们将把所有的api测试放在那里。

trans-unit.source: We will start writing our first acceptance tests with PhpBrowser.
trans-unit.target: 我们将开始使用PhpBrowser编写我们的第一个验收测试。

trans-unit.source: We’ll assume that we have a ‘login’ page where we get authenticated by providing a username and password. Then we are sent to a user page, where we see the text Hello, %username%. Let’s look at how this scenario is written in Codeception:
trans-unit.target: 我们假设我们有一个“登录”页面，通过提供用户名和密码来进行身份验证。然后，我们被发送到一个用户页面，在该页面上看到文本 Hello, %username% 。让我们看一下如何在Codeception中编写这种情况：

trans-unit.source: WebDriver module provides advanced methods for the browser session, however, they can only be used from Helpers.
trans-unit.target: WebDriver模块为浏览器会话提供了高级方法,但是,它们只能在Helpers中使用。

trans-unit.source: WebDriver module returns Facebook\WebDriver\Remote\RemoteWebElement instances PhpBrowser and Framework modules return Symfony\Component\DomCrawler\Crawler instances
trans-unit.target: WebDriver模块返回 Facebook\WebDriver\Remote\RemoteWebElement 实例PhpBrowser和Framework模块返回 Symfony\Component\DomCrawler\Crawler 实例

trans-unit.source: What if we could check our application without running it on a server? That way we could see detailed exceptions on errors, have our tests run faster, and check the database against predictable and expected results. That’s what functional tests are for.
trans-unit.target: 如果我们可以检查应用程序而不在服务器上运行该怎么办？这样，我们可以看到有关错误的详细异常，使我们的测试运行更快，并根据可预测和预期的结果检查数据库。这就是功能测试的目的。

trans-unit.source: What if you deal with data which you don’t own? For instance, the page look depends on number of categories in database, and categories are set by admin user. How would you test that the page is still valid?
trans-unit.target: 如果您处理不拥有的数据该怎么办？例如，页面外观取决于数据库中类别的数量，并且类别由管理员用户设置。您将如何测试该页面仍然有效？

trans-unit.source: What if you want to execute the same test scenario with different data? In this case you can inject examples as \Codeception\Example instances. Data is defined via the @example annotation, using JSON or Doctrine-style notation (limited to a single line).
trans-unit.target: 如果要对不同的数据执行相同的测试方案怎么办？在这种情况下，您可以将示例作为 \Codeception\Example 实例注入。数据是通过 @example 注释使用JSON或Doctrine样式表示法（限制为一行）定义的。

trans-unit.source: When a test gets to this point it stops and shows a console where you can try all available commands. This can be very useful when you write functional, acceptance, or api test.
trans-unit.target: 当测试进行到这一步时,它会停止并显示一个控制台,在那里你可以尝试所有可用的命令。这在你写功能测试、验收测试或api测试时非常有用。

trans-unit.source: When a web site acts unpredictably you may need to react on that change. This happens if site configured for A/B testing, or shows different popups, based on environment.
trans-unit.target: 当一个网站的行为不可预测时,你可能需要对这种变化做出反应。如果网站配置为A/B测试,或者根据环境显示不同的弹出窗口,就会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: When executing a request via one of the request functions the request and response component are both recreated.
trans-unit.target: 通过请求功能之一执行请求时，将重新创建 request 和 response 组件。

trans-unit.source: When execution time of your tests is longer than a coffee break, it is a good reason to think about making your tests faster. If you have already tried to run them on SSD drive, or to use PhantomJS instead of Selenium, and the execution time still upsets you, it might be a good idea to run your tests in parallel.
trans-unit.target: 当你的测试执行时间比喝咖啡的时间还长的时候,这是一个很好的理由来考虑让你的测试更快。如果你已经尝试过在SSD硬盘上运行测试,或者使用PhantomJS代替Selenium,但执行时间仍然让你不满意,那么并行运行测试可能是个好主意。

trans-unit.source: When it’s hard to define condition to wait for, we can retry a command few times until it succeeds. For instance, if you try to click while it’s animating you can try to do it few times until it freezes. Since Codeception 3.0 each action and assertion have an alias prefixed with retry which allows to retry a flaky command.
trans-unit.target: 当很难定义要等待的条件时，我们可以重试几次命令，直到命令成功。例如，如果您在动画时单击，则可以尝试几次，直到冻结为止。从Codeception 3.0开始，每个操作和断言都具有以 retry 开头的别名，该别名允许重试易碎的命令。
当测试失败时,会被打印出来

trans-unit.source: When used with Zend Framework 2 or Symfony2, Doctrine’s Entity Manager is automatically retrieved from Service Locator. Set up your functional.suite.yml like this:
trans-unit.target: 当与Zend Framework 2或Symfony2一起使用时，Doctrine的实体管理器会自动从服务定位器中检索。像这样设置您的 functional.suite.yml ：

trans-unit.source: When we decide to clean up a database, we should make this cleaning as fast as possible. Tests should always run fast. Rebuilding the database from scratch is not the best way, but might be the only one. In any case, you should use a special test database for testing. Do not ever run tests on development or production databases!
trans-unit.target: 当我们决定清理数据库时，我们应该尽快进行清理。测试应始终快速进行。从头开始重建数据库不是最佳方法，但可能是唯一的方法。无论如何，您应该使用特殊的测试数据库进行测试。永远不要在开发或生产数据库上运行测试！

trans-unit.source: When writing tests you should prepare them for constant changes in your application. Tests should be easy to read and maintain. If a specification of your application is changed, your tests should be updated as well. If you don’t have a convention inside your team for documenting tests, you will have issues figuring out what tests will be affected by the introduction of a new feature.
trans-unit.target: 编写测试时，应为应用程序中的不断变化做好准备。测试应该易于阅读和维护。如果更改了您的应用程序规范，则还应该更新您的测试。如果您的团队内部没有记录测试的惯例，那么在确定哪些测试会因引入新功能而受到影响时会遇到问题。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you need to define more actions a callback can be used. A WebDriver module is passed for argument:
trans-unit.target: 当你需要定义更多的动作时,可以使用回调。一个WebDriver模块被传递作为参数。

trans-unit.source: Whenever you start writing a story you are describing a specific feature of an application, with a set of scenarios and examples describing this feature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你开始写一个故事时,你都是在描述一个应用程序的特定功能,并有一组描述这个功能的场景和例子。

trans-unit.source: Where unit is the name of suite and the -c option specifies the path to the codeception.yml configuration file to use. In this example we will assume that there is frontend/codeception.yml configuration file and that we will execute the unit tests for only that app.
trans-unit.target: 其中 unit 是套件的名称， -c 选项指定要使用的 codeception.yml 配置文件的路径。在此示例中，我们将假定存在 frontend/codeception.yml 配置文件，并且仅执行该应用程序的单元测试。

trans-unit.source: While Behat is a great tool for Behavior Driven Development, you still may prefer to use Codeception as your primary testing framework. In case you want to unify all your tests (unit/functional/acceptance), and make them be executed with one runner, Codeception is a good choice. Also Codeception provides rich set of well-maintained modules for various testing backends like Selenium Webdriver, Symfony, Laravel, etc.
trans-unit.target: 虽然Behat是一个行为驱动开发的伟大工具,但你仍然可能更喜欢使用Codeception作为你的主要测试框架。如果你想统一所有的测试(单元测试/功能测试/验收测试),并用一个运行器来执行,Codeception是一个不错的选择。同时Codeception还为各种测试后台提供了丰富的模块,如Selenium Webdriver,Symfony,Laravel等。

trans-unit.source: While WebDriver duplicates the functionality of PhpBrowser, it has its limitations: It can’t check headers since browsers don’t provide APIs for that. WebDriver also adds browser-specific functionality:
trans-unit.target: 尽管WebDriver复制了PhpBrowser的功能，但它有其局限性：它无法检查标头，因为浏览器没有为此提供API。WebDriver还添加了特定于浏览器的功能：

trans-unit.source: While testing web application, you may need to wait for JavaScript events to occur. Due to its asynchronous nature, complex JavaScript interactions are hard to test. That’s why you may need to use waiters, actions with wait prefix. They can be used to specify what event you expect to occur on a page, before continuing the test.
trans-unit.target: 在测试Web应用程序时，您可能需要等待JavaScript事件发生。由于其异步特性，因此很难测试复杂的JavaScript交互。这就是为什么您可能需要使用带有 wait 前缀的操作程序waiters 。在继续测试之前，可以使用它们来指定预期在页面上发生的事件。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards (*) can be used to specify multiple directories at once.
trans-unit.target: 通配符(*)可用于同时指定多个目录。
他们会使用不同的数据库吗?
他们会使用不同的主机吗?

trans-unit.source: With custom assertion methods you can improve readability of your tests and keep them focused around the specification.
trans-unit.target: 通过自定义的断言方法,您可以提高测试的可读性,并将测试的重点放在规范上。

trans-unit.source: With the @depends annotation you can specify a test that should be passed before the current one. If that test fails, the current test will be skipped. You should pass the method name of the test you are relying on.
trans-unit.target: 使用 @depends 批注，您可以指定应在当前测试之前通过的测试。如果该测试失败，则将跳过当前测试。您应该通过您所依赖的测试的方法名称。

trans-unit.source: With the PhpBrowser you can click the links and fill in the forms. That will probably be the majority of your actions.
trans-unit.target: 使用 PhpBrowser ,您可以单击链接并填写表格。那可能是您的大部分动作。

trans-unit.source: With the first argument you can run all tests from one suite:
trans-unit.target: 使用第一个参数,你可以从一个套件中运行所有测试。

trans-unit.source: With this procedure we also ensure that everyone in a team knows what has been developed, what has not, what has been tested and what has not.
trans-unit.target: 有了这个程序,我们还可以确保团队中的每个人都知道什么是已经开发出来的,什么是没有开发出来的,什么是已经测试出来的,什么是没有测试出来的。

trans-unit.source: Within a long scenario, you should describe what actions you are going to perform and what results should be achieved. Comment methods like amGoingTo, expect, expectTo help you in making tests more descriptive:
trans-unit.target: 在很长的场景中，您应该描述将要执行的操作以及应取得的结果。注释方法，如 amGoingTo ， expect ， expectTo 帮助您做出测试的详细描述：
与队列服务器配合使用。

trans-unit.source: Wrapper for basic shell commands and shell output
trans-unit.target: 基本的shell命令和shell输出的封装器。

trans-unit.source: Writing acceptance tests with Codeception and PhpBrowser is a good start. You can easily test your Joomla, Drupal, WordPress sites, as well as those made with frameworks. Writing acceptance tests is like describing a tester’s actions in PHP. They are quite readable and very easy to write. If you need to access the database, you can use the Db Module.
trans-unit.target: 用Codeception和PhpBrowser编写验收测试是一个好的开始。您可以轻松测试您的Joomla，Drupal，WordPress网站以及使用框架制作的网站。编写验收测试就像用PHP描述测试人员的行为一样。它们可读性强，非常容易编写。如果需要访问数据库，则可以使用Db模块。

trans-unit.source: Writing good locators can be tricky. The Mozilla team has written an excellent guide titled Writing reliable locators for Selenium and WebDriver tests.
trans-unit.target: 编写好的定位符可能很棘手。Mozilla团队撰写了一篇出色的指南，名为《为Selenium和WebDriver测试编写可靠的定位器》。

trans-unit.source: XML and HTML reports are stored to the _output directory. The best way to review report is to open index.html from tests/_output/coverage in your browser. XML clover reports are used by IDEs (like PHPStorm) or Continuous Integration servers (like Jenkins).
trans-unit.target: XML和HTML报告存储到 _output 目录。查看报告的最佳方法是从浏览器中的 tests/_output/coverage 打开 index.html 。XML三叶草报告由IDE（如PHPStorm）或Continuous Integration服务器（如Jenkins）使用。

trans-unit.source: Xml - actions for validating XML responses (no Json responses)
trans-unit.target: Xml-用于验证XML响应的操作(没有Json响应)。

trans-unit.source: Yii2 tests are included in Basic and Advanced application templates. Follow the Yii2 guides to start.
trans-unit.target: Yii2测试包含在基本和高级应用程序模板中。按照Yii2指南开始。

trans-unit.source: You are allowed to execute as much requests as you need inside test.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在测试中执行你所需要的任何请求。

trans-unit.source: You can access \Codeception\Scenario in the Cept and Cest formats. In Cept, the $scenario variable is available by default, while in Cest you should retrieve it through dependency injection:
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用Cept和Cest格式访问 \Codeception\Scenario 。在Cept中，默认情况下 $scenario 变量可用，而在Cest中，您应该通过依赖注入来检索它：

trans-unit.source: You can add your own commands to Codeception.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在Codeception中添加自己的命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also access framework globals inside a test or access the dependency injection container inside the Helper\Functional class:

trans-unit.source: You can control execution flow with @before and @after annotations. You may move common actions into protected (non-test) methods and invoke them before or after the test method by putting them into annotations. It is possible to invoke several methods by using more than one @before or @after annotation. Methods are invoked in order from top to bottom.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 @before 和 @after 批注控制执行流程。您可以将常用操作移入受保护的（非测试）方法中，并通过将其放入批注中在测试方法之前或之后调用它们。通过使用多个 @before 或 @after 注释可以调用多种方法。方法从上到下依次调用。

trans-unit.source: You can create a Cest file by running the command:
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过运行命令来创建Cest文件。

trans-unit.source: You can create group files manually or generate them from third party applications. For example, you can write a script that updates the slow group by taking the slowest tests from xml report.
trans-unit.target: 你可以手动创建组文件,或者从第三方应用程序中生成它们。例如,你可以写一个脚本,通过从xml报告中提取最慢的测试来更新慢组。

trans-unit.source: You can define assertions by using assertXXX methods in your modules.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在你的模块中使用 assertXXX 方法来定义断言。

trans-unit.source: You can even specify patterns for loading multiple group files with a single definition:
trans-unit.target: 您甚至可以指定用一个定义加载多个组文件的模式。

trans-unit.source: You can execute one (or several) specific groups of tests:
trans-unit.target: 您可以执行一组(或几组)特定的测试。

trans-unit.source: You can further filter which tests are run by appending a method name to the class, separated by a colon (for Cest or Test formats):
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过在类上附加一个方法名,用冒号隔开来进一步过滤要运行的测试(对于Cest或Test格式)。

trans-unit.source: You can introduce your own step decorators. Take a look into sample decorator classes and create your own class which implements Codeception\Step\GeneratedStep interface. A class should provide getTemplate method which returns a code block and variables passed into a template. Make your class accessible by autoloader and you can have your own step decorators working.
trans-unit.target: 您可以介绍自己的阶梯装饰器。查看示例装饰器类，并创建自己的类，该类实现 Codeception\Step\GeneratedStep 接口。类应提供 getTemplate 方法，该方法返回代码块和传递到模板中的变量。通过自动加载器使您的类可以访问，并且您可以使自己的步骤装饰器起作用。

trans-unit.source: You can only click on links with valid URLs or form submit buttons

trans-unit.source: You may use multiple database connections, each will use a separate transaction; to prevent accidental mistakes we will warn you if you try to connect to the same database twice but we cannot reuse the same connection.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用多个数据库连接,每个连接都将使用一个单独的事务;为了防止意外错误,如果您尝试两次连接到同一个数据库,我们会警告您,但我们不能重复使用同一个连接。

trans-unit.source: You may want to perform even more complex assertions on a response. This can be done by writing your own methods in the Helper classes. trans-unit.source: You will get a fresh application in \Yii::$app at the start of each test (available in the test and in _before()).
trans-unit.target: 每次测试开始时，您都会在 \Yii::$app 中获得一个全新的应用程序（可在测试中和 _before() 中获得）。

trans-unit.source: Your application is most likely using object-relational mapping (ORM) to work with the database. In this case, Codeception allows you to use the ORM methods to work with the database, instead of accessing the database directly. This way you can work with models and entities of a domain, and not on tables and rows.
trans-unit.target: 你的应用程序很可能使用对象关系映射(ORM)来处理数据库。在这种情况下,Codeception允许你使用ORM方法来处理数据库,而不是直接访问数据库。这样你就可以对一个领域的模型和实体进行工作,而不是对表和行进行工作。

trans-unit.source: Your custom commands have to implement the interface Codeception\CustomCommandInterface, because there has to be a function to get the name of the command.
trans-unit.target: 你的自定义命令必须实现接口Codeception/CustomCommandInterface,因为必须有一个函数来获取命令的名称。
